title: DRAGON BALL SUPER UNIVERSE SURVIVAL
sequence: Click SPACE or RETURN to proceed...
So! Where's it gonna be? Somewhere awesome right?
It is a special place indeed... The null realm.
It's a world of infinite emptiness, where not even time or space exist...
Since literally nothing is in the null realm, there is nothing there to break.
Thus you'll be free to fight as vigorously as you like!
... also, as with the tournament you held between the sixth and the seventh, the ultimate champion of our competition will be awarded the Super Dragon Balls.
E-excuse me. And what prize does the champion's home universe receive?
It is a prize by its contrast, for the universes that don't win shall be eliminated.
It's simple. All of the defeated universes will be promptly wiped from existence.
Grand Zeno will see to it personally!
